Class JPanelApplicationState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JPanelApplicationState
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    JPanel to notify the states of the application: connection state with Pure Data, connection state with the Leap Motion
    Author:
    chavailm
    See Also:
